attributes.action: I would like the vaccination to not be made mandatory for care workers.
attributes.additional_details: I feel we should be able to choose what goes in to our body. I also feel like we should not be forced to do something especially if you work in a care home and families do not have to be vaccinated.i feel people with other fertility problems should be considered exempt as it explains to not try for a baby a month before the vaccine and also 2 months after the vaccine aswell. I feel not enough research has gone in to the vaccine regarding fertility. I also being forced out of long time work.
attributes.background: I would like to government to do more research regarding infertility with the covid vaccine and consider other medical conditions regarding conceving and fertility problems also.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Do not require health and social care workers to take covid-19 vaccination
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577842
